segments.text: Hi . Can I help you with anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Can I look at this ring ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Let me get it out for you . What is your size ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe I am a six .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you have any necklace that would go well with this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , we have a few to choose from . They are over here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's no price tag on this necklace .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I'm sorry . I'll check the price for you . It is $ 199 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This necklace is a little short . Do you have one that is longer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Why don't you try this one on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This one is much better . Can I try on the ring with this necklace ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for all the help .
segments.speaker: S2
